tika.dc.description: At the heart of each relationship, says McGinnis, is the friendship factor-the essential ingredient of warmth and caring. With captivating case histories and anecdotes about such famous people as George Burns, Howard Hughes, and C. S. Lewis, McGinnis shares the secret of how to love and be loved.

epub.title: Friendship Factor
epub.doctitle: The Friendship Factor: How to Get Closer to the People You Care for
